text: (Pls don't mind my bus enthusiast talk) Recently, I took the bus service 975 at around midnight on a Mercedes-Benz OC500LE. Some of my friends say that's its haunted here. Most likely the ghosts from the Lim Chu Kang Cemetery travelled here and haunt the Interchange here. Service was good here. Staff was kind too. When I asked someone where was the toilet, (I think I was blind for a while.)the staff was did not hesitate to help me! And I think that its not haunted.

I recently rode the 970 bus on 05 Feb afternoon and I am incredibly thankful for the bus driver's exceptional service. They went above and beyond to locate my lost AirPods charging case and I am deeply grateful for their kindness. I highly recommend SMRT and its driver for their reliable and caring service. Thank you!
very bad bus service long waiting times and time board is always not accurate. All the bus like  972 972M 979 920 922 976 975 always come late 5 minutes later....
Clean as it is, bus service is very bad. You're more likely to miss your bus if you follow the time board or worst, bus wont even come at all. Price still increase be a """good service""".
Bus 976 arrival timing for pick up at interchange itself was changed for no reason. I encountered this more than 3 times during the last 3 months.
